import React, { Fragment ,useState, useEffect,useRef} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import * as $ from 'jquery' import DeleteModal from '../components/DeleteModal'; const AddCompany=()=>{ let managername=useRef(); let manageremail=useRef(); let managerdesignation=useRef(); let managerphone=useRef(); let [input,handleInput]=useState({type:'',fullname:'',phonenumber:'',email:'',city:'',address:'',staff:[]}); let [designation,handleDesignation]=useState([]); let [errors,handleError]=useState(); let [successhide,handleSuccesshide]=useState('d-none'); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:3010/designation/').then((res)=>{ handleDesignation(res.data); }) },[]); const handleChange=(e)=>{ managerdesignation.current.value; } const handleAdd=()=>{ } const handleSubmit=()=>{ } return(

Add Designation

handleSubmit(e)}>
Data Inserted Successfully
handleInput({...input,name:e.target.value})} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter FullName" />
handleInput({...input,phone:e.target.value})} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter Phone Number" />
handleInput({...input,email:e.target.value})} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter Email" />
handleInput({...input,city:e.target.value})} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter City " />

Add Manager

handleChange(e)} ref={managername} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter Name " />
handleChange(e)} ref={manageremail} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter Email " />
handleChange(e)} ref={managerphone} className="form-control" placeholder="Enter Phone # " />
Sno Name Email Phone Designation Action
) } export default AddCompany;
